      • removeExtraneousHtmlTags

        public void removeExtraneousHtmlTags(java.util.List<java.lang.String> tagNames)
        removes a number of publisher tags which clutter the HTML. These tags should not affect the content (they are mainly interactive). Currently: script link object iframe fieldset button style This functionality can be overridden in subclasses if required
        Parameters:
        htmlElement -
